results.content:
the content is really good the app goes through a lot of cases and I learnt a lot and for sure I recommend,  but there is some minor stuff that I didn't like:
the third section is really confusing it's not well explained that would be great if you design the process of the jwt and stuff within a schema also you didn't explain exactly what is Subject Observable when should I use or that...
Also a bit the fact that you a pre-ready code so I had to download it and copy and paste instead of focusing on one thing.

results.content:
Starts great. Creating the code - app together. 
And then in section  3... the NodeJs parts was a bit messy. Sometimes I had the feeling like I missed a part of the training. 
This training has some real potential, in my option it needs a little bit more attention section 3 NodeJS setup
